dsOverview.title: NOAA Highly Reflective Cloud (HRC) Analyses, daily 1971-1987

summary.p: HRC highly reflective clouds, tropical daily (for tropical precipitation). Has daily occurrence of HRC for 1-degree squares from 25S to 25N. Daily grids January 1971 to January 1988. Also, monthly grids have been calculated for which a NOAA atlas is available.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/ESRL > Earth System Research Laboratory, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Clouds > Cloud Amount/Frequency
